title: Drawing, "Shelving Unit", ca. 1929–30
medium: Graphite and green color pencil on tracing paper
markings: Stamp in black ink, lower right: DONALD DESKEY/145 WEST 57TH STREET/NEW YORK CITY
inscribed: Inscribed in graphite erased at upper margin center: Carlbach-Book [---]; inscribed in graphite at lower left: 9; inscribed in red color pencil at lower right: P; lower right in graphite: SCALE 1"=1'0"/7677 [circled]; inscribed dimensions
description: Perspective, plan, and elevation drawing for shelving unit. Three rectangular glass shelves, open on all sides to the right, connected by tubular, polished metal. Rectangular pedestal/base at left, probably wood.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Shelving Unit", ca. 1929–30.
ca. 1929–30. Graphite and green color pencil on tracing paper. Gift of Donald Deskey. 1988-101-872.
